text: The Great Citizen () is a 1938 Soviet movie directed by Fridrikh Ermler."Великий гражданин" 1938Великий гражданин (1937) It stars Nikolay Bogolyubov, Ivan Bersenev, and Oleg Zhakov. ==Actors== * Nikolay Bogolyubov - Shakhov - the great citizen * Ivan Bersenev - Kartashov - the conspirator * Oleg Zhakov - Borovsky - the accomplice * Zoya Fyodorova - Nadya * Boris Poslavsky - Sizov == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1938 movies Category:1930s biographical movies Category:Soviet biographical movies Category:Movies directed by Fridrikh Ermler
title: The Great Citizen
